pullRequest.title: [hueemulation] Fixes HueEmulation DiscoveryIp not used
pullRequest.bodyText:
Non uniform parameter naming prevented config param from being saved
and used for discovery.
[hueemulation] Fixes discovery IP not saved/used

This is a fix for the issue opened by me: #7410

beforeCommit.message:
Fixes HueEmulation DiscoveryIp not used

Non uniform parameter naming prevented config param from being saved
and used for discovery.

afterCommit.message:
Fixes HueEmulation DiscoveryIp not used

Non uniform parameter naming prevented config param from being saved
and used for discovery.

Signed-off-by: Thomas Felix <thomas.felix@tfelix.de>

nodes.bodyText: I think the fix should be the other way around. The config field name should be updated instead. This config is only supposed to handle a single IP address right?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -51,7 +51,7 @@
 			<description>All items that are tagged with the given tags are ignore by the Hue Emulation Service. Use commas to separate multiple entries.</description>
 			<default>internal</default>
 		</parameter>
-		<parameter name="discoveryIp" type="text" required="false">
+		<parameter name="discoveryIps" type="text" required="false">

beforeCommit.message:
Adds backwards compatibility for old config key

Tries to extract the old non plural s key  from the config as
a fallback.

Signed-off-by: Thomas Felix <thomas.felix@tfelix.de>

afterCommit.message:
Adds backwards compatibility for old config key

Tries to extract the old non plural s key  from the config as
a fallback.

Signed-off-by: Thomas Felix <thomas.felix@tfelix.de>

and used for discovery.

nodes.bodyText:
I think you should change this back and just change the field name in the HueEmulationConfig.
You can keep the the description change though.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -51,9 +51,9 @@
 			<description>All items that are tagged with the given tags are ignore by the Hue Emulation Service. Use commas to separate multiple entries.</description>
 			<default>internal</default>
 		</parameter>
-		<parameter name="discoveryIp" type="text" required="false">
+		<parameter name="discoveryIps" type="text" required="false">

nodes.bodyText: You should be renaming this field instead of creating another one.

commit.message:
Reverts property change to preserve compatibility

Signed-off-by: Thomas Felix <thomas.felix@tfelix.de>
